* * IAsn1Type * * An interface for Asn-1 types. * Copyright (c) 2007 Henri Torgemane * * See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

 
package com.hurlant.util.der
{
  import flash.utils.ByteArray;
  
  public interface IAsn1Type
  {
    function getType():uint;
    function getLength():uint;
    
    function toDER():ByteArray;
    
  }
}
